title: City & Community - Chinatowns Lost? The Birth and Death of Urban Neighborhoods in an American City
itunes:title: City & Community - Chinatowns Lost? The Birth and Death of Urban Neighborhoods in an American City
description: Author Daniel Yoder Zipp discusses his article, "Chinatowns Lost? The Birth and Death of Urban Neighborhoods in an American City," published in the December 2021 issue of City & Community.
content:encoded: Author Daniel Yoder Zipp discusses his article, "Chinatowns Lost? The Birth and Death of Urban Neighborhoods in an American City," published in the December 2021 issue of City & Community.
